## compile() function

Compiles the given pattern into a matching function. The returned function accepts a single string and returns true iff the pattern matches it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function compile(pattern: string, options?: Options): MatchFn;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pattern | string | Pattern to compile |
|  options | [Options](./xspattern.options.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Additional options for the compiler |

<b>Returns:</b>

[MatchFn](./xspattern.matchfn.md)

a matcher function for the given pattern
